title: America's Best Real Estate Agents Identified
text:
America's Best Real Estate Agents Identified RE/MAX Places More Agents in National Survey Than Other Brands RE/MAX, LLC 8 hours ago  Content preferences Done 
DENVER, July 7, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- More RE/MAX agents are named in the prestigious 2015 "America's Best Real Estate Agents" survey than agents with any other real estate brand. Released on Tuesday, the industry's largest ranking of agents is based on the number of homes sold in 2014. Of the nearly 10,000 participating agents who qualified, 1 in 5 is affiliated with RE/MAX. View gallery . 
"RE/MAX agents are always among the industry's best when ranked by productivity," said Dave Liniger , CEO, Chairman of the Board and Co-Founder of RE/MAX, LLC. "Consumers prefer to work with agents who have solid experience. They want to rely upon a trusted advisor during an increasingly complex transaction, and RE/MAX agents provide that high level of customer service." 
The third annual "America's Best Real Estate Agents" survey is produced by REAL Trends , a leading real estate news and analysis firm. The survey is open to individual agents closing a minimum of 50 transaction sides or $20 million in sales volume or team leaders with 75 sides and $30 million in volume. 
The number of agents representing the top three brands in the survey include: RE/MAX 2,090 Coldwell Banker 1,843 Keller Williams 1,504 
Earlier this year, two other annual industry surveys found that RE/MAX agents outperform their competition. In the REAL Trends 500 and the Power Broker Report , RE/MAX agents averaged more than twice the number of transaction sides as other agents participating in the two surveys. 
About the RE/MAX Network: RE/MAX was founded in 1973 by Dave and Gail Liniger, with an innovative, entrepreneurial culture affording its agents and franchisees the flexibility to operate their businesses with great independence. Over 100,000 agents provide RE/MAX a global reach of nearly 100 countries. Nobody sells more real estate than RE/MAX. 
RE/MAX, LLC, one of the world's leading franchisors of real estate brokerage services, is a wholly-owned subsidiary of RMCO, LLC, which is controlled and managed by RE/MAX Holdings, Inc. ( RMAX ). 
With a passion for the communities in which its agents live and work, RE/MAX is proud to have raised more than $150 million for Children's Miracle Network Hospitals ® and other charities. 
For more information about RE/MAX, to search home listings or find an agent in your community, please visit www.remax.com . For the latest news about RE/MAX, please visit www.remax.com/newsroom . View gallery
